Title: Authorizes municipal legislative bodies to enact local laws and ordinances providing for mediation of land use decisions
Summary: Authorizes certain municipal legislative bodies, including towns and villages, to enact local laws and ordinances providing for non-binding mediation of land use decisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, the town law, and the village law, in relation to authorizing the use of mediation in land use decisions
